articles.title: Electoral impact of Kavanaugh confirmation may reveal Roe v. Wade effect on midterms
articles.description: 40 US House seats flipped to Democratic candidates following Kavanaugh's confirmation, including 27 where GOP candidates were previously leading in the polls.
articles.content:
